bibl.title: Patriarchy, Property and Death in the Roman Family. (Cambridge Studies in Population, Economy and Society in Past Time. 25.)
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 66-69: comparison of the microsimulation output and the household census data from Roman Egypt.
SALLER Richard P., Patriarchy, Property and Death in the Roman Family. (Cambridge Studies in Population, Economy and Society in Past Time. 25.)
Cambridge, University Press, 1994, 8°, xiv-249 pp., 7 tabl. ISBN 0-521-32603-6. £35.
